FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.desc: Go through the FAQ’s to know more about our Full Stack developer course, fees and project details.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the various learning options offered under the Full Stack developer course in Mysore?
FaqDATA.ans: Most importantly, we offer online learning choices for our full stack developer course in Mysore. Aside from that, we provide a blended learning program designed specifically for working professionals. In addition, you can participate in live online sessions in hybrid learning mode under our Full Stack developer course in Mysore. Besides, you will also be performing some hands-on work on the industrial project site.That said, we can only offer fully online classes via live sessions due to the outbreak. This means you can talk to your instructor in real time, just like in a traditional face-to-face session. Additionally, at this time, all practical sessions of our Full stack developer course in Mysore will be conducted using cloud-based services.

FaqDATA.ques: Will there be a make-up session available if I have to miss a class of Full Stack developer course in Mysore?
FaqDATA.ans: Firstly, we offer live online classes for full stack developer courses in Mysore. Also, all of our students have access to recorded versions of those classes. In addition, we also give you unlimited access to these recorded sessions, so you can go back to them whenever you need theoretical help in your full stack career. As a result, you need not be disappointed if you miss any of the live classes under our full stack developer training in Mysore. However, we strongly advise you to participate in all live classes.

FaqDATA.ques: What if I did not understand an entire module? Will I be able to repeat the class?
FaqDATA.ans: Most importantly, if you do not understand an entire module under the Full Stack developer course in Mysore, you can repeat the same class with another batch. Thus, leaving no chance for you to remain in confusion about the learning modules.

FaqDATA.ques: Are there any fee discounts available for full stack developer course in Mysore?
FaqDATA.ans: If you are considered eligible for a scholarship, you may be able to save up to 10% on your fees for full stack developer course in Mysore. Moreover, we also offer scholarships to Covid-affected candidates, unemployed candidates, and mothers returning to the workforce after a vacation.

FaqDATA.ques: What kind of certification does the Full Stack developer course in Mysore provide?
FaqDATA.ans: The hitch is that if you take the full stack developer course in Mysore, you will not just obtain any ordinary type of certification or academic degree. Instead, we offer a globally recognized project management certificate. The firm with which you completed your industrial project can also give you direct certification.
